mLab | Senior Software Engineer, Tech Lead, Database Architect | SF | ONSITE | VISA

mLab (www.mlab.com) is looking for Senior Software Engineers, Tech Leads and Database Architects to help us manage, deploy and scale our vast fleet of MongoDB deployments, and to help make our customers the happiest and most productive MongoDB developers on the planet.

In the process, you'll be exposed to every major cloud provider and infrastructure technology. We currently run on AWS, Google Cloud Platform, and Microsoft Azure and have integrated with all of the major Platform-as-a-Service providers (Heroku et al.). You'll become an expert in MongoDB, cloud automation, and mLabâ€™s suite of automation tools (some of which we open-source).
